title: James Cleverly – 2023 Statement on Hamas Attacks on Israel
author: admin
summary: The statement made by James Cleverly, the Foreign Secretary, on 7 October 2023.
content:
The UK unequivocally condemns the horrific attacks by Hamas on Israeli civilians.

The UK will always support Israel’s right to defend itself.
